description: Welcome to the unofficial KA Internal API documentation! If you're wondering if certain data can be accessed, if some endpoint requires authorization, or just want to know more about the API, you've come to the right place! In this webpage, every known API endpoint that the KA website uses is documented and described. If you happen to find a new one that isn't here, please leave a comment with some specifics like where you found it, how it can be triggered, and some technical info about the web request itself.

User.title: User
User.description: All user endpoints take either `?kaid=<kaid>`, `?username=<username>`, `?email=<email>`, or `?userId=http://googleid.khanacademy.org/<userid>`

endpoints.description: Get user info like showcase badges, points, videos watched, KAID, avatar, and much more.

endpoints.header: Get a list of the user's Tips & Thanks
endpoints.description: This endpoint returns an array of the user's comments on programs, videos, or articles.

endpoints.header: Get a list of the user's badges
endpoints.description: This endpoint returns a list of the user's badges, contained in five different sections. The five sections correspond to the five badge rarities, and contain a nested array with the list of badges the user owns.

badgeCollections.categoryDescription: Meteorite badges are common and easy to earn when just getting started.

endpoints.header: Get a summary of the user's discussion history
endpoints.description: This endpoint returns a small summary of the user's discussion history.
